messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] david
messages.msgSnippet: ... U.S. funds, please.  We could cash a Canadian check, but it would take 10 days to clear. ... Thanks! david -- Should now be considered the definitive work
messages.messageBody:
benliam@... wrote:

> In a message dated 2/3/01 5:35:44 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
>
>
>> For those who wish, tax deductible donations should be made out to
>> the
>> Gandhian Foundation, and sent to me --
>
> David,sorry to have to bother you with this detail, but would the
> cheque have
> to be in US funds? I am in Canada. I guess a US money order would be
> the
> safest?

U.S. funds, please. We could cash a Canadian check, but it would take
10 days to clear.

> Sorry to hear the news that your friends have not received the aid
> they need.
> How horrible. My thoughts and prayers go out to them.
>
> cath
>

Thanks!

david

--

"Should now be considered the definitive work on homeschooling....an
intellectual tour de force." --Joseph Chilton Pearce. To read a sample
chapter of "And the Skylark Sings with Me", or for ordering or author
tour information, visit my website -- www.skylarksings.com -- or send an
e-mail to shantinik@...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] david
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/3/01 5:35:44 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... David,sorry to have to bother you with this detail, but would the cheque have to be in US
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/3/01 5:35:44 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


For those who wish, tax deductible donations should be made out to the
Gandhian Foundation, and sent to me --


David,sorry to have to bother you with this detail, but would the cheque have
to be in US funds?  I am in Canada.  I guess a US money order would be the
safest?

Sorry to hear the news that your friends have not received the aid they need.
How horrible.  My thoughts and prayers go out to them.

cath

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] david
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/31/01 10:13:35 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Ok david, just let me know if clothing can be sent, and if not, i would like to try the funds
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/31/01 10:13:35 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


Funds are obviously more flexible for them to use.  My friends live in
VERY rural areas, where transport under normal conditions is pretty
difficult.


Ok david, just let me know if clothing can be sent, and if not, i would like
to try the funds option.

cath
